## Reading:

### Required Reading (everyone):

* Statistical Rethinking, Ch. 16 ("Generalized Linear Madness"), sections 16.3---16.5.

### Reading Notes:

This section continues on the connection between scientific and statistical models by introducing Bayesian models that incorporate ordinary differential equations to represent the dynamics of time series.
